ygData.subject: Re: Broken Song
ygData.msgSnippet: This was reported to the list yesterday mornin - after the patch. Veeshan went down last night - and there happened to be GMs in channel - so take this for
ygData.messageBody:
This was reported to the list yesterday mornin - after the patch.

Veeshan went down last night - and there happened to be GMs in channel - so
take this for what's it's work.

Q: To GM - fippy Bards levitate seems to only work for 3 tics after a
pulse, does not continue, and you have to land before it can be restarted.
Secret Nerf - or unintended bug.

A: Unintended bug - it's amazing what can break.



At 12:14 PM 12/2/99 +0900, you wrote:
>Greetings,
>first allow me to introduce myself. I am new to this list, but not a new
bard nor a new player to Everquest. I currently have a 31st level Bard on
Innoruuk, Rosha. I have been playing him since March 26th, just not in a
hurry to level.
>
>Anyway, with the latest patch, I have noticed a problem with the level 31
song, the levitate one. Now when I play it, it starts, I rise, I get the
message I feel as if I am about to fall, followed by You are already
floating. This repeats for 2 cycles. Immediately after the 3rd cycle of
the song, I then fall to the ground, the icon disappears. On the next
cycle, it all repeats. It does this even if twisting, so it seems to me
that it now only allows continuos levitation for two song pulses. I did
just acquire this song, so I don't profess to be an expert, however, it did
not function like this prior to the patch. Just a word of caution using
this song now, and be on the lookout for other changes!!
>
>Rosha Crist
>
>
>[Attachments have been removed from this message]
>
>>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
